item.title: Failed repair leading to pothole, 6th April
item.description:
Nearside of road outside bungalow heading towards Churchdown. This has been repaired multiple times most recently 2 months ago and has failed yet again. Can't someone repair it properly?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 323, Innsworth Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Inadequate cleaning of road at construction site, 6th April
item.description:
Aqua are building new homes at this site. Several weeks. A lot of vehicles delivering materials, taking away soil etc. No wheel wash facilities in site. Some inadequate attempts made to clean the road, this simply redistributes the mud, gutters have sand and gravel building up. This is now spreading down Two Hedges Road and may eventually block drains. Tewkesbury BC have been told, also Glos Highways. During the day there may be very heavy deposits from vehicle wheels, if no rain probably left to dry.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crown Close, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Speed sign not working, 6th April
item.description:
